nodes.text: Yoda's Republic taskforce was a task force in the Republic Navy by the Battle of Kashyyyk. During the battle, the task force drove the Confederacy of Independent Systems's invasion fleet away, although a massive droid army of gunships, droid tanks, and LM-432 crab droids were still on-planet and occupied the Wawaatt Archipelago.
Yoda's Republic taskforce was mentioned in Star Wars: Complete Vehicles, a 2018 reference book published by Dorling Kindersley for the Incredible Cross-Sections.
